entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS AROUND 90
